title: Introducing ChatGPT Enterprise
summary: OpenAI has announced the launch of ChatGPT Enterprise, a version of its language model designed for enterprise use. It offers enhanced security and privacy features, unlimited access to GPT-4, longer context windows for processing longer inputs, advanced data analysis capabilities, customization options, and more. ChatGPT Enterprise has already been adopted by industry leaders such as Block, Canva, Carlyle, The Estée Lauder Companies, PwC, and Zapier. It provides organizations with a powerful AI assistant that can assist with various tasks while protecting company data. The enterprise version also includes features for large-scale deployment and management, such as an admin console and usage insights. ChatGPT Enterprise is SOC 2 compliant and ensures data encryption in transit and at rest. It has been shown to increase productivity and empower employees in organizations like Klarna and Asana. OpenAI plans to introduce additional features, including customization options, availability for smaller teams, and specialized tools for specific roles.
